tasks.label: valgrind
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceRoot} && make fclean && make re && valgrind --leak-check=full --track-origins=yes --verbose --trace-children=yes --track-fds=yes ./minishell

tasks.label: leaks
tasks.command: while true ; do leaks minishell ; sleep 1 ; done

tasks.label: test
tasks.command: cd ${workspaceRoot} && make re && cd tester && rm minishel || true && bash test.sh --fast
